title: Business Development Manager
text:
About RecruiTech

RecruiTech is a Durban based Recruitment Agency, specialising in IT and Freight. We recruit nationally in both our specialised fields and have been in operation for over 5 years. RecruiTech employs specialised consultants with over 15 years’ recruitment experience collectively and empowers them to push the boundaries of what's possible. Our atmosphere is open, innovative and fun with a relatively flat organizational structure to encourage creativity and optimal collaborative results.

Our aim is to provide a service to our clients’ bringing efficiency and industry knowledge as well as recruitment solutions that will help transform businesses. We pride ourselves on our ability to understand our clients’ requirements, their company culture and to create a recruitment process that is streamlined, efficient and painless.

To our candidates, we offer sound career advice based on our industry knowledge and strive to partner with them in a time of change and often stressful times while changing positions.

RecruiTech is an exempted Micro Enterprise with a Level 4 BEE Status and a 100% BEE Procurement Recognition Level.
